abstract: Possible witnesses who could be called to testify — or whose names may come up during the trial — include Lloyd C. Blankfein, Goldman’s chief executive, and A.G. Lafley, the former chief executive of Procter & Gamble.
snippet: Possible witnesses who could be called to testify — or whose names may come up during the trial — include Lloyd C. Blankfein, Goldman’s chief executive, and A.G. Lafley, the former chief executive of Procter & Gamble.
lead_paragraph: The potential witness list has been released for the insider trading trial of Rajat K. Gupta, the former director for Goldman Sachs and Procter & Gamble, and as expected, it is chock full of boldfaced names.

headline.main: The Boldface Names on the Witness List for Gupta’s Trial
